title: Gangster from Chicago 1950 Film-Noir | They Hi-jack $40 Million in merch from trucks!

sources.title: Gangster from Chicago 1950 Film-Noir | They Hi-jack $40 Million in merch from trucks!
sources.description:
Trucker hits the highway to clear his name - but the road to redemption is paved with double-crosses and stolen cargo!
When Joe stops to help stranded motorists, he's knocked out and his rig vanishes - making him the prime suspect in a corporate hijacking ring. With cops on his tail and a treacherous executive framing him, Joe must outdrive roadblocks and outsmart backstabbers before his parole runs out.

Original Title: Hi-Jacked (1950) | AKA: Gangster from Chicago

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/XVKbW_MFz3k

Hard-hitting cinematography by Philip Tannura (Flame of Stamboul,  A Night of Terror)
